## DataStore.findCredentials() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findCredentials({ iss, sub }: {
        iss?: string;
        sub?: string;
    }): Promise<{
        rowId: string;
        hash: string;
        iss: {
            did: string;
        };
        sub: {
            did: string;
        };
        jwt: string;
        nbf: number;
        exp: number;
    }[]>;
```
